title: Britain to Boost Nuclear Weapons Stockpile in Defense-Policy Shift
content:
1. Britain to Boost Nuclear Weapons Stockpile in Defense-Policy Shift  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Integrated review: UK to lift cap on nuclear stockpile  BBC News
  3. Johnson: UK must strike balance in dealings with China  Guardian News
  4. China is major threat, but UK will keep up trade links, says defence review  The Guardian
  5. UK labels Russia top security threat, issues warning on China, and promises to build more nuclear warheads  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
